body:
With realistic saber damage, enemies become much easier to defeat. We can make up for that with numbers, if we optimise performance sufficiently (simulation LODs?). There are many large-scale ground battles throughout Star Wars (e.g. Naboo, Geonosis, Kashyyyk, Hoth) that would be cool to see at scale.

Somewhat at odds with the planned increased simulation fidelity. But definitely a fun stress test!
title: Dynasty Warriors-style mode/levels
